requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Status-driven eligibility checks for assignment pipelines". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #3 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #3 API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Sensitive Document Redaction and Controlled Disclosure. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
